Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel twice single breakfast consists croissant hard roll plus cup tea coffee choice service hotel clean ive stayed hotel star rating road thats head rome

Reviews.Title: “lovely hotel with perfect location”
Reviews.Author: StaceyH_10
Reviews.Content: recommended stay friend am glad hotel authentic italian hotel lovely furniture ideally located near vatican 5 minute walk hotel situated little streets surrounded lots little local shops cafes night easy sleep main street staff friendly help hotel clean fresh certainty recommend else

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location; Good Value”
Reviews.Author: tazdev71
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights 2427 7 minute walk st peters 35 floor typo spacious bathroom huge balcony bed comfortable typical rome hotel floor tile bit dusty slippers didnt bring own furniture bit dated dont rome hotel pay extra 5 euronight ac rate didnt mind breakfast typical rome pane cafe latte daytime reception desk attendant friendly spoke pretty english nighttime reception desk attendant bit grumpy spoke excellent english computer lobby 2 euros hour water soda available purchase try restaurant immediately hotel lobby door relatively affordable stay hotel parents sister friends stayed previously choose
